Class Robot

  • java.lang.Object
    • models.Robot
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GraphicalComponent

    public class Robot
extends java.lang.Object
implements GraphicalComponent
    A small wheeled robot with distance sensors.
    Author:
    lana
